meanings.definition: A failure to understand something correctly.
meanings.sent1: The misunderstanding between the two friends was quickly resolved.
meanings.sent2: There was a misunderstanding about the meeting time, causing confusion.
meanings.sent3: The misunderstanding about the party theme led to some hilarious costume choices.
meanings.sent4: The misunderstanding was a thick fog obscuring the path to clear communication.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun game to illustrate the concept of misunderstanding to the students.
